title: Review: LOOK Trail ROC Flat Pedals for Mountain Biking tested over a Scottish Winter
content:
At the back end of last year, LOOK launched a series of flat pedals for the first time in their 70 year history. Released alongside some flashy Vibram rubber-topped flat pedals for light off-roading were the LOOK Trail ROC pedals aimed specifically at full on mountain biking. Excited to see what LOOK have to offer […]

The post Review: LOOK Trail ROC Flat Pedals for Mountain Biking tested over a Scottish Winter appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Jessie-May Morgan
